pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatially Smoothed MRCD Estimator // Estimation of the Spatially Smoothed Minimum Regularized Determinant (ssMRCD) estimator and its usage in an ssMRCD-based outlier detection method as described in Puchhammer and Filzmoser (2023) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2305.05371. Included are also complementary visualization and parameter tuning tools.
